workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.45312726494895883 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.0016990043726344273 --weight-decay 0.0007827754737835172 --lr 0.000515495437613926 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 151898 --max-lr 0.00038589537136170867 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.6362802884598833 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.19038750992792752 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
